destination.description: The Lake Country is the most isolated area of the planet Naboo. Its population consists of farmers, shaak herders, and glass craftworkers. A popular vacation spot, visitors travel to see its waterfalls and open grasslands filled with wildflowers.

place 1.name: Varykino
place 1.description: An island in Naboo's scenic Lake Country which houses the Varykino Villa, the lake retreat of the Naboo epic poet Omar Berenko and the Naberrie Royal Family.

place 2.name: Water Meadows
place 2.description: The water methods is a valley dotted with numerous lakes and surrounded by mountains. In springtime, the festival of Glad Arrival transform the communally-owned, Pastoral Collective-maintained meadows into a setting for colorful pageants and musical performances for several days.

place 3.name: Convergence
place 3.description: Convergence is a majestic country house built in the style of Theed architecture, incorporating rotund domes and graceful towers. This splendid home was the ancestral of the house of Palpatine.
